tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE conservation_projects (
    project_id INT,
    project_name VARCHAR(255),
    start_date DATE,
    end_date DATE,
    budget DECIMAL(10,2)
);
CREATE TABLE Organization (organization_id INT PRIMARY KEY, name VARCHAR(255), location VARCHAR(255), contact_email VARCHAR(255));
CREATE TABLE Project (project_id INT PRIMARY KEY, project_name VARCHAR(255), start_date DATE, end_date DATE, organization_id INT REFERENCES Organization(organization_id));
CREATE TABLE DeforestationData (data_id INT PRIMARY KEY, location VARCHAR(255), date DATE, deforestation_rate FLOAT, organization_id INT REFERENCES Organization(organization_id));
CREATE TABLE Employee (employee_id INT PRIMARY KEY, name VARCHAR(255), position VARCHAR(255), organization_id INT REFERENCES Organization(organization_id));
CREATE TABLE Volunteer (volunteer_id INT PRIMARY KEY, name VARCHAR(255), activity_type VARCHAR(255), organization_id INT REFERENCES Organization(organization_id));
